name: docker-hello-world
description: A simple Docker project that serves a static HTML website using nginx alpine image

scripts.stop: docker stop hello-world && docker rm hello-world
scripts.test: docker run -d -p 8080:80 --name test-container hello-world-app:test && sleep 5 && curl -f http://localhost:8080 && docker stop test-container && docker rm test-container
scripts.deploy:minikube: eval $(minikube docker-env) && npm run build && kubectl create deployment hello-world --image=hello-world-app && kubectl expose deployment hello-world --type=NodePort --port=80

author: Atul
